question: A student plans to write a report about a type of bird that includes only facts. Which statement should the student leave out of the report?
candidate_answers: (A) These birds are blue. (B) These birds are beautiful. (C) Most of these birds are 13 cm tall. (D) Most of these birds are about 10 grams.
answer: Most of these birds are about 10 grams.
label: D
